reviews.text: I have infrequent panic attacks, during which I collapse and can’t move or speak. This happened to me yesterday on the platform at Finsbury Park. Thankfully, Steve and his team were AMAZING, and got me to safety quickly and efficiently. They made sure I had everything I needed, called me an ambulance and really helped calm me down. I can’t thank them enough for everything they did, they are all lovely, hilarious people and deserve a raise ❤️

I’ve found that most of the staff are rude. The station is very dirty, toilets also very dirty, food on platform overpriced. 

Lots of trains at rush hours are only 4 cars and then at not so busy times the train will be 8cars and empty.

Staff seem to be very rude..
My journey home and to work every day
Staff and services are generally good on platform and off. Regular delays and changes to overground and Thameslink but other than that it does what it needs to most of the time.
Bug reconstruction, which I have filmed over the past few months, and will post on to Google
